rooms.description: An expansive entrance hall designed for traditional Kerala aesthetics, featuring local stone cladding and intricate woodwork.
A spacious living room with natural light from Vastu-optimized placements, integrating large windows facing the east to invite positive energy.
A dining area adjacent to the living room, designed in Kerala-style with murals and handcrafted tiles, ensuring proper flow of space.
Modern yet traditional kitchen area with ventilation optimized per Vastu principles, positioned to the northeast for auspicious energy flow.
A guest bedroom featuring Kerala-style decor and comfortable furnishings.

openings.description: Large front door ensuring ease of access while maintaining privacy, designed in Kerala architectural style.
Balcony offering panoramic views and fresh air, aligned according to Vastu guidelines.
Large east-facing windows for natural light and energy balance.

utilities.description: A private gym located within the ground floor, designed with modern equipment and Kerala aesthetics integrated into traditional design elements.
A swimming pool area adjacent to the house, landscaped following local norms and Vastu for serenity and balance.
